trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies access rights to a memory-mapped file that is not associated with a file on disk.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to get or set permissions on a file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to read and write to a file with the restriction that write operations will not be seen by other processes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to run an application file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to exert full control over a file, and to modify access control and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx$ xxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This value represents the right to do anything with a file and is the combination of all rights in this enumeration.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to open and copy a file as read-only.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx x xxxx xx xxxx$xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to open and copy access and audit rules from a file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx x xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or extended file system attributes.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx$ xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to open and copy a file, and the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx x xxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to open and copy a file, the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file, and the right to run an application file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx x xxxx$ xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx x xxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to change the owner of a file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x
